name: Fishing Simulator Kaiju Edition
description:
Hey everyone!

Welcome to our first fully functional game where you play as two sailors who are trying to catch some fishes in Kaiju lake.

We made the game in a period of 4 days for the Jamulator Game jam! We are really excited to see what everyone thinks of the game, so feel free to comment if you guys have anything to say about the game! We would love to see your reactions and high scores!

If you are interested in some more info on the game make sure to check out the credits and if you look close enough you might find a secret. ;)

Good luck with fishing and make sure to beware the Kaiju!

- The JAM Boys - Tim Buhrs & Jordy de Waal
